00127       bool startsAfter(TICK date, TICK delay =0);
00134       bool startsBefore(IntegerDomain::bound const &date) const {
00135        return getStart().lowerBound()<=date;
00136       }
00137

00214 
00234       void restrictTime(IntegerDomain const &s,
00235                      IntegerDomain const &d,
00236                      IntegerDomain const &e);
00250       void restrictStart(IntegerDomain const &s) {
00251        restrictTime(s, s_durationDomain, s_dateDomain);
00252       }
00266       void restrictDuration(IntegerDomain const &d) {
00267        restrictTime(s_dateDomain, d, s_dateDomain);
00268       }
00282       void restrictEnd(IntegerDomain const &e) {
00283        restrictTime(s_dateDomain, s_durationDomain, e);
00284       }
00285     private:
00286       Variable m_start, m_duration, m_end;
00287       static IntegerDomain const s_dateDomain;
00288       static IntegerDomain const s_durationDomain;
